meeting_info.organization: City Council Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the March 26, 2024 meeting of the Quality of Life, Arts and Culture Committee.

agenda_items.title: Library Strategic + Facilities Plan
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the Library Strategic and Facilities Plan.
agenda_items.presenter: Heather Lowe, Assistant Director, Dallas Public Library

agenda_items.title: Horse-Drawn Carriage Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Horse-Drawn Carriage program.

agenda_items.title: North Texas Municipal Water District Sanitary Sewer Overflow Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the sanitary sewer overflow from the North Texas Municipal Water District.
agenda_items.presenter: Sarah Standifer, Director, Dallas Water Utilities

agenda_items.title: Supplemental Agreement No. 1
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the architectural services contract with Brown Reynolds Watford Architects, Inc. for soil testing and increase reimbursable expenses for the Dallas Airport System Signage.

agenda_items.title: Supplemental Agreement No. 2
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the engineering services contract with Kimley-Horn and Associates, Inc. for construction phase services for the Lemmon Avenue Streetscape Enhancements Project.

agenda_items.title: Supplemental Agreement No. 7
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 7 to the professional services contract with M. Arthur Gensler Jr. & Associates, Inc. for major maintenance and repairs to Parking Garages A and B.

agenda_items.title: Multimedia Messaging Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service contract for multimedia messaging services for the Women, Infant, Children Program.

agenda_items.title: Increase in Construction Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with BAR Constructors, Inc. for additional work on the new pump station at the Elm Fork Water Treatment Plant.

financial_items.description: Supplemental Agreement No. 1 for soil testing and reimbursable expenses for Dallas Airport System Signage.
Supplemental Agreement No. 2 for construction phase services for Lemmon Avenue Streetscape Enhancements Project.
Supplemental Agreement No. 7 for major maintenance and repairs to Parking Garages A and B.
Service contract for multimedia messaging services for Women, Infant, Children Program.
Increase in construction services contract for new pump station at Elm Fork Water Treatment Plant.
